answers.answer: 120/80 is like text book perfect. You have no worries.
Did u do this at home or in your drs office? If it was at the drs then the nurse would tell you if it was high... my nurse didnt even tell me what mine was.. im hoping that means its normal.
Thanks! I had to check myself because I have a headache, an this morning I had nosebleed when I blew my nose!
Ur blood pressure is normal it supposeed tonbe 120 over 80
The 1st number should be between 90-120 the 2nd number should be between 60-90 so 120 over 80 is good.
Its the extra blood flow and pressure in your body that causes the stuffiness and nose bleeds. I have them every now and then as well but my BP has been very normal ...
Last check up my bp was 118/78, so its not a big difference, just that the headache made me think that maybe my bp was high!
120/80 is text book perfect. I have preeclampsia and 140/90 is the worrisome point.

question: My bp is at 120/80.... Is it high??? Should I be concerned?
title: blood pressure??
